short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We analyze ingredients as you shop online so you can pick the best products for your curls!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curlplace.com strives to make curly hair care easier. 

The Curlplace: Ingredient Scanner lets you identify ingredients in hair products known within the community to be harmful for your curls. You can shop online on your regular sites and be informed of a product's suitability whilst you browse and without any additional effort! 

Ingredients we identify:
Sulfates - extremely drying for your curls
Silicones - these build up in your hair and weigh down your curls
Alcohols - certain alcohols also have a drying effect
Parabens - unhealthy preservatives
Waxes - cause build up as well!

We support 16 different online stores, and make it easy for you to let us know which other ones we should support!
